thread.title: India Introduces Guidelines for Ride-Hailing Apps
thread.title_full: India Introduces Guidelines for Ride-Hailing Apps - WSJ

author: Joanna Sugden
title: India Introduces Guidelines for Ride-Hailing Apps
text:
NEW DELHI—India’s government has issued its first federal guidelines for app-based ride-hailing companies after almost a year of legal wrangling in the national capital over the legal status of Uber Technologies Inc. and others looking to establish themselves in the world’s second-most populous country.
The Ministry of Road Transport issued the new guidelines, which aren’t binding, to state governments since passing laws to regulate...
